customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Write a comprehensive set of unit tests for the selected code. It should setup, run tests that check for correctness including important edge cases, and teardown. Ensure that the tests are complete and sophisticated. Give the tests just as chat output, don't edit any file.
customCommands.description: Write unit tests for highlighted code

customCommands.name: refactor
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Refactor the selected code to improve readability, maintainability, and performance without changing its functionality. Explain the changes made and the rationale behind them.

customCommands.name: generateDocs
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Generate comprehensive documentation for the selected code, including descriptions of functions, classes, parameters, and examples of usage.

customCommands.name: detectFixBugs
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Analyze the selected code to detect any potential bugs or issues. Provide detailed explanations of the issues found and suggest fixes.
customCommands.description: Detect and fix bugs in highlighted code

customCommands.name: optimize
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Analyze the selected code and suggest performance optimizations. Explain the suggested changes and how they will improve the code's performance.

customCommands.name: explainCode
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Explain the selected code in detail. Describe what it does, how it works, and any important concepts or patterns used.

customCommands.name: review
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Perform a code review for the selected code. Highlight any issues, suggest improvements, and explain your reasoning.
customCommands.description: Provide code review suggestions for highlighted code
